comments_since_last_sample.body: this is what happened to me: so i was playing gacha online with 1 of my friends and then the chat was like super slow and then i left the game and so did my friend then i got out of roblox and i was doing some thing and then i went back on and then i couldnt see the games only my friends and then all of the sudden my account got logged out so i was like panicking becuase i forgot my password but then i looked up to see how to get my account back then i saw this so now i know.
If you have a Chromebook and press Ctrl+u you can look at the code and it does say 1 day for the countdown
